languages.text: "Знание, переданное мирянам без должного посвящения — прискорбная необходимость, а не знак доверия. Я не вправе разглашать таинства, дарованные мне с получением сана".

"The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."
languages.original_text: "Знание, переданное мирянам без должного посвящения — прискорбная необходимость, а не знак доверия. Я не вправе разглашать таинства, дарованные мне с получением сана".

traits.locale_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “向缺乏正确启蒙的普通人传授知识并不是信任的表现，而是不得已为之的徒劳。我无权透露在取得衔级时所了解到的那些秘密知识。”
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: “向缺乏正确启蒙的普通人传授知识并不是信任的表现，而是不得已为之的徒劳。我无权透露在取得衔级时所了解到的那些秘密知识。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La transmission de connaissances aux profanes qui n'ont pas suivi la formation adéquate est une nécessité, et non un gage de confiance. Je ne suis pas autorisé à divulguer les mystères qui m'ont été confiés lorsque j'ai reçu mon rang. »
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: « La transmission de connaissances aux profanes qui n'ont pas suivi la formation adéquate est une nécessité, et non un gage de confiance. Je ne suis pas autorisé à divulguer les mystères qui m'ont été confiés lorsque j'ai reçu mon rang. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Weitergabe von Wissen an Laien, denen die nötige Initiation fehlt, ist eine bedauerliche Notwendigkeit, kein Zeichen von Vertrauen. Es ist mir nicht gestattet, die Mysterien preiszugeben, die mir gewährt wurden, als ich meinen Rang erhalten habe."
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: "Die Weitergabe von Wissen an Laien, denen die nötige Initiation fehlt, ist eine bedauerliche Notwendigkeit, kein Zeichen von Vertrauen. Es ist mir nicht gestattet, die Mysterien preiszugeben, die mir gewährt wurden, als ich meinen Rang erhalten habe."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「適切なイニシエーションを持たない信徒に知識を与えることは、不幸にも必要なことであり、信頼の証ではない。階級についたときに授かった謎を明かす自由は私にはない」
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: 「適切なイニシエーションを持たない信徒に知識を与えることは、不幸にも必要なことであり、信頼の証ではない。階級についたときに授かった謎を明かす自由は私にはない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Impartir conocimiento a los laicos que carecen de una iniciación adecuada es algo que se hace por necesidad y no una muestra de confianza. No estoy en posición de divulgar los misterios que me fueron confiados al asumir mi rango».
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: «Impartir conocimiento a los laicos que carecen de una iniciación adecuada es algo que se hace por necesidad y no una muestra de confianza. No estoy en posición de divulgar los misterios que me fueron confiados al asumir mi rango».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

languages.text: "Münasip vakfa nail olmayan meslek dışı kişileri bilgi ile donatmak güven işareti değil, talihsiz bir gereklilik. Kıdemimi aldığımda bahşedilen gizemleri açık etmeye haiz değilim."
languages.original_text: "The imparting of knowledge to laity who lack the proper initiation is an unfortunate necessity, not a sign of trust. I am not at liberty to divulge the mysteries granted to me when I received my rank."

traits.locale_text: "Münasip vakfa nail olmayan meslek dışı kişileri bilgi ile donatmak güven işareti değil, talihsiz bir gereklilik. Kıdemimi aldığımda bahşedilen gizemleri açık etmeye haiz değilim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
